# VIQ (Julien Pannetier)

> Artist project blending electronic music, synthwave, and dreampop. Based in Paris, France.

## Artist Profile

- **Legal Name:** Julien Pannetier
- **Project Name:** VIQ
- **Genres:** Synthwave, Dreampop, Indie Electronic, Chillwave, Atmospheric
- **Record Labels:** Stratford.Ct, Lofi Girl
- **Location:** Paris, France
- **Active Since:** 2019

## Sound & Aesthetics

- **Core Elements:** Nostalgic melodies, analog synthesizer textures, cinematic atmospheres, and rhythmic electronic beats
- **Influences:** Lorn, Justice, Daft Punk, Mk.gee
- **Themes:** Analog film, grunge, melancholy

## Official Links

- **Website:** https://www.viqmusic.net
- **Official Store:** https://viq-shop.fourthwall.com/

## Streaming Platforms

- **Spotify:** https://open.spotify.com/artist/6XpN8mRlhuOXuvEyva4yjZ

- **Tidal:** https://tidal.com/artist/14851275
- **Deezer:** https://www.deezer.com/fr/artist/53988822
- **Amazon Music:** https://music.amazon.fr/artists/B07SVHSJ37/viq
- **YouTube Music:** https://www.youtube.com/c/VIQmusic
- **Pandora:** https://www.pandora.com/artist/viq/AR7v5wJfcr9gkKX
- **Bandcamp:** https://viqmusic.bandcamp.com/
- **SoundCloud:** https://soundcloud.com/viqmusic

## Social Media

- **Instagram:** https://www.instagram.com/viqmusic/
- **TikTok:** https://www.tiktok.com/@viqmusic
- **Facebook:** https://www.facebook.com/Viqmusic
- **Threads:** https://www.threads.com/@viqmusic

## Notable Features

- Featured on Lofi Girl, EDM.com, Roblox, Electronic Gems, KALTBLUT Magazine, Stereofox, Nightride FM, etc.
- Collaborations with the video game industry
- Physical releases (vinyl, cassette) via Stratford.Ct
